name: Call of Duty Warzone Multiplayer
description:
I remade call of duty warzone into a multiplayer 1v1 so that you can face your friends.

Controls:

Create a room and tell your friend to click Find room and join the room you made

WASD to move around, hold shift to run, spacebar to jump, press C to slide

left-click to shoot, right-click to aim, R to reload

E to open chests/buystation, F to pick up cash, hold F to apply armor plates if you bought them

The first to win 6 rounds wins the game.

Note: 

I am using a free tier for my networking solution and it allows only up to 10 lobbies (20 players as 2 people per lobby) concurrently to play.
